contact.contactMessage: If you have any questions, you can contact the author via one of the following options
donate.commandMessage: Support this project. Run /donate command for details
donate.description: This bot is a non-commercial project, yet it requires resources to continue converting voice into text. I'd appreciate your support to help cover infrastructure costs and keep the bot available 24/7. Please contact me (the author) if you have any questions about donations. Donations are non-refundable. While you won't receive extra bonuses for donating, your contribution directly helps keep the bot running around the clock. Thank you for supporting the project! We use Stripe, a world-leading payments provider, to ensure your donation process is safe and secure.
donate.payment.description:
AudioMessBot telegram bot donation. Non-refundable. Your support is greatly appreciated! 

 We use Stripe as our payment provider, ensuring all transactions are safe and secure
donate.payment.form.description: I invite you to make a small one-time donation to support this project. We use Stripe as our payment provider, ensuring all transactions are safe and secure
donate.payment.form.descriptionStars: I invite you to make a small one-time donation to support this project. Support the bot with Stars - Telegram's internal currency for fast, secure one-click transactions
donate.payment.form.label: One-time donation
donate.payment.form.title: one-time donation for AudioMessBot
